attributes.action: add to the ballot papers for all local, national and european elections a "none of the above" box
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you looked at the available candidates on the ballot paper and thought "I don't want to vote any of you!" and given your vote to the candidate least likely to win? I believe we should be able to register a willingness to vote but not for the choices available to us. If you feel the same way please add your name to this petition. Thanks for your time.

rejection.details: Please contact Parliament or the Electoral Commission with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
